Posts.Content: anissacloud9 wrote: Anyone out there been on Xeloda?  I'm 34 years old, a Stage III, diagnosed Oct. 1st, did 6 rounds of TAC chemo, and just had a left mastectomy last week (recovering at home still).  Just found out I have to go back on chemo now, and doc's putting me on Xeloda for 3 months.  Been reading a lot, but I want to hear from real folks.  Anyone? -Anissa Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Xeloda, anyone? anissacloud9 shrink
